/wiki/Konstantin_Meladze: Konstantin Shotayevich Meladze ( Russian : Константин Шотаевич Меладзе , Georgian : კონსტანტინე მელაძე ) ( born 11 May 1963 in Batumi ) is a Ukrainian composer and producer of Georgian descent . He is the older brother of singer Valery Meladze and co-founder and co-producer of the Ukrainian girl group Nu Virgos ( Russian : ВИА Гра ) .
